A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm sure even George Lucas was shaking his head after seeing this atrocious mess. This film was an insult to the previous films\, the lore\, and the fans. Shame on Rian Johnson and Disney for this abomination. They took pretty much every anticipated plot point from The Force Awakens and answers them in the worst possible ways. I have never been so disappointed in a Star Wars film\, and yes that includes the lackluster prequels.
